Desc.eng: Thank you, stranger! I’ll be forever grateful.
You don’t have to thank me. I like diversity. I’ve never fought monsters for… water.
And what a glorious battle it was. Van Helsing almost lost his… Hat!
Well, I have a great hat! Proper Borgovian handiwork, still new. Would you like to have it?
That’s really nice of you. Thank you.
That’s a kind offer, but no. The lady was only joking.
